1.0.name: wordpress/banckle-online-meeting
1.0.description:
Through Banckle Online Meeting Widget for WordPress you can allow your WordPress blog or website visitors to easily register for your Banckle Online Meeting sessions right from your blog or website. They do not even need to have an account at Banckle. You can also apply password for invite-only meetings.

Experience an instant Banckle Online Meeting now and tell your friends that HD-video conferencing just got affordable.

Being Collaborative and Social

Banckle Online Meeting not only provides a great platform for eLearning sessions or holding web conferences, but also introduces you into a whole new online collaboration experience. You can create one-time and recurring meetings, have HD video conferencing, record the sessions and share these password-protected recordings later with whomever you want. You can even download
